text: Sumeria, or Sumer, is the region of city-states in ancient Mesopotamia. Sumeria may also refer to: *1970 Sumeria, a minor planet *"Donna Sumeria", a song on the 2006 Mission of Burma album The Obliterati *"Sumeria", a song on Canadian musician Devin Townsend's 2011 album Deconstruction ==See also== *Sumerian (disambiguation) *Sumer (disambiguation)
title: Sumeria (disambiguation)
